data.name: Color Lim
data.detailed_description:
In a world where color is everything, little slime Lim, who was not born with color, goes on a journey to find color. Lim becomes more curious about himself as he meets various people. Can Lim find his true color?

[Playing with colors]

Lim can absorb and utilize a variety of colors instead of having no unique colors. It doesn't damage the same color, it can damage other colors, so change it to suit the situation and play strategically!

[Best choice in a given environment]

Lim is a slime that is small but has various abilities unlike its appearance. Show your best play using the environment and ability given to your target point!

[Unique world view of reality and fantasy]

Civilization and the developing world are caused by some kind of big explosion, and most of the life disappears, new life forms emerge, and the world is brought back to its feet. Go around a unique world where reality and fantasy are fused!

data.name: Adventure mosaics. Lost Expedition
data.detailed_description:
After her plane crashes, Ellie sets off on a perilous adventure to return home. The journey won’t be easy, but Ellie’s faithful friends will come to the rescue. Working together, they can survive anything—be it the desert lands or the tropical jungle!

150 colored Japanese crossword puzzles of all difficulty levels, a pleasant summer story, and charming music will help you pass the time and have a ton of fun! Puzzles are a great opportunity to challenge yourself!

Complete the levels, solve the puzzles, and help Ellie and her friends get home!

- 150 colorful and memorable levels!
- Striking visual effects!
- An exciting adventure!
- Rich summer colors!
- Improve your logical and abstract thinking!
- User-friendly interface and addictive gameplay!

data.name: Train Valley World
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD!


About the Game

Train Valley World welcomes you to the heart of the Industrial Revolution. The newest entry in a beloved management sim franchise evolves the Train Valley experience by adding deeper tycoon mechanics to the staple railway puzzle gameplay formula. Travel across the world to build and manage efficient railroads, create your own maps with a robust level editor and join other players in online multiplayer. All aboard!



Go around the globe of the early 1900s and build railroads across 25 levels inspired by gorgeous real-world cities. Create and operate transportation networks with a variety of locomotive types while managing limited resources, producing goods and ensuring your railways are efficient.



The beloved level editor evolves to offer even more ways to design your own maps and share them with the community via Steam Workshop. Players have already created thousands of unique levels in previous Train Valley games, and we can’t wait to see what you come up with using these new tools.



Team up or compete with up to 4 players on one map in online multiplayer modes. Grow railways together or challenge others and see who comes out on top in the ultimate tycoon stand-off!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2244470/Train_Valley_World/

data.name: REMEDIUM: Sentinels
data.detailed_description:
REMEDIUM - OUT NOW IN EARLY ACCESS

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1659090/REMEDIUM/


LEARN THE STORY BEHIND THE WORLD OF REMEDIUM GAME

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1659090/REMEDIUM/


Discuss the game on Discord!



About the Game




REMEDIUM: Sentinels is a roguelite fast-paced auto-shooter that is set in the same world as REMEDIUM game. It has been more than a hundred years since the Grey Plague has won turning most humans into vicious mutant freaks, and only a handful of cities still stand amidst the death and chaos that consumed the land.

You control a Sentinel created by alchemists with only one goal - defend the cities against the endless hordes of mutants until your reactor dies. Combine items and alchemical elements to acquire more and more weapons and create unique builds!



  • Easy to play, hard to master

  • Navigate your Sentinel through hordes of deadly mutants while it obliterates the enemies with its weapons!

  • Collect Prime Matter to upgrade the Sentinel



  • Combine weapons and items to enhance them with new elemental effects

  • Survive the onslaught until the Sentinel's reactor runs out!

  • Face and defeat powerful Bosses

  • Complete dozens of challenges and unlock new powers



  • Wide selection of guns and skills created by the art of alchemy

  • Tactically upgrade on the go or thoughtfully create character builds to fend off mutants with different perks and resistances

  • The longer you last, the stronger you become - gaining access to even more skills, weapons and enemies to defeat. Simply put, insane replayability!



https://store.steampowered.com/app/2244480/REMEDIUM_Sentinels/

data.name: Caterpilla (Spectrum/VIC-20)
data.detailed_description:
Originally released in 1983, this was one of the very earliest releases from Ocean Software, which would go on to be one of Europe's biggest game developers and publishers of the 1980s/90s. Caterpilla is a simple riff on an arcade classic, released for the ZX Spectrum and Commodore VIC-20. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version.

Gameplay

The deadly Caterpilla makes its way down the screen, weaving back and forth. Shoot it before it reaches the bottom of the screen. You will also need to contend with mushrooms that block the way, and a fearsome spider that will lunge at you!


This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including:

  • Saving/loading the game at any point
  • Support for most modern game controllers
  • Full control remapping
  • Image scaling and smoothing options

About the Game



Are you tired of playing the same old basketball games? Our multiplayer game offers a fresh and exciting take on the classic sport. Play against friends or strangers and experience the thrill of competition in a whole new way.

Our game features fast-paced gameplay and realistic physics that make every game a challenging and exciting experience. Choose from a variety of game modes, including 1v1 matches, free-for-all brawls, and team games. Customize your character and compete against players from around the world.

Every game is a new opportunity to showcase your skills and outsmart your opponents. Can you rise to the challenge and become the best player on the court? The only way to find out is to join the game and see for yourself.

It's time to show off your skills and have a blast in the most exciting multiplayer basketball game out there.

Don't miss out on the fun. Wishlist our game now.

data.name: Marvelous Marbles
data.detailed_description:
Build marble runs where your imagination is the only limit.


Get started easily with the snap in place system, and turn it off when you want to go beyond the trodden path.

Use a variety of shapes and materials to bring your creations to life. When they are not enough, use mechanical contraptions to lift, push and steer your marbles. Still can't find the right style or function of a piece? Then you can build your own! Marvelous Marbles is meant to be modded and comes with Steam Workshop integration for easy sharing.





Then sit back and relax while watching balls zip through the tracks with the automatic camera system.

If you have a VR headset, put it on and experience even more immersion. Pick up and place pieces like in real life. But move those expensive vases out of the way, first!
Will you dare follow a marble down your creations?



ASMR?


* Over 50 different pieces to build with, across 3 distinct styles.

* A multitude of balls of various colors and styles.

* Switches, lifts and other mechanical objects.

* Moddable.

data.name: Don't Steal My Christmas!
data.detailed_description:
Don't Steal My Christmas! is a game that shows that all creatures want to celebrate Christmas in warmth and comfort. Fight against your friend for the side of people or Christmas monsters.

You have a choice: play as the Snowman or as the Boy.
The snowman has taken over the house where people live and is preparing to celebrate Christmas with his monster friends. He needs to complete a number of pre-holiday tasks, such as: Cook Christmas dinner, Set the table, and others, and then celebrate Christmas in the house. He will be hindered by the Boy, who by violent means tries to stop him. Electric shockers and first-aid kits are scattered around the house to protect against the Boy, and you also have the opportunity to give a slap on the back of the head and throw it away very far.

In the game for a Boy, you are given the opportunity to use many objects in order to prevent the Snowman from finishing his business, such as: Lamps, Dishes, Christmas gifts and others. More powerful means of attack are in locked boxes, which can be opened by collecting keys scattered around the location. Protect the house from the monster to win this game!

data.name: Space landing
data.detailed_description:
Controls: Z , X, Enter, Shift, Arrow Keys
Due to an accident, a space being finds himself on planet earth in search of the ship's core. Aestris will therefore have to face various dangers in order to recover the core of the ship, and return home.
The game is retro pixel art style, single player. It's a top-down adventure with puzzles and brain teasers.
in the game you will play an alien who will have to overcome different puzzles, interact with humans.
Space Landing is an exploratory topdown game.

data.name: Somewhere in between
data.detailed_description:
Game is set in an fantasy universe, on an island. Milo, the main protagonist is given a task to find his lost dog Buddy. Milo need’s to overcome hardships and anxiety and become a stronger person in order to reunite with Buddy. But at the moment he thinks that his adventure is over, something happens that makes things a lot more complicated. Help our protagonist solve cognitive puzzles and enjoy the world filled with audio and visual stimulants that can make you feel like you are reading a fable.

Key features:
-For fans of Journey, The first tree and Firewatch.
-Game filled with audio and visual stimulants that can make you feel relaxed
-A short game focused on story and puzzle solving.

data.name: Alchemist: The Potion Monger Demo
data.detailed_description:
MORE GAMES

Art Games Studio

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1105040/Alchemist_Simulator/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1155870/WW2_Bunker_Simulator
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1231840/Climber_Sky_is_the_Limit/


About the Game


Alchemist: The Potion Monger is a unique mixture of Puzzle and RPG game, in which you can leave your lab, venture into the world and change it with your brews!

Take the role of apprentice of the alchemical arts, in a world full of anthropomorphic (described or thought of as having a human form or human attributes ~Merriam-Webster) animals!
Choose your character "Race" from a wide array of animal types, with their strengths and weaknesses.

And begin your alchemical journey!

BREW POTIONS

Use various alchemical (and not only... - demonic altars, holly waters, time-controlling sands, and more) tools to process the ingredients.
Then put them into the cauldron and start brewing!

SELL YOUR BREWS

Residents of the surrounding town and countryside, have their potion needs, fulfill them and become the wealthiest alchemist alive!

USE THEM YOURSELF!

During your adventures, you may need healing, immeasurable strength, insanely high jumps, or even the ability to fly, help yourself and drink one of your brews!
Every potion can also be thrown to create an environmental effect.
Set fires, launch wildlife and NPCs into the air, or make the whole village throw up!
Do good, bad, or just have fun - the whole world is your playground.

EXPLORE

Venture outside your warm and safe alchemical hut into the world, discover various secrets, meet distinct NPCs, and gather ingredients!
Collect merit badges and then complete the assigned challenge to learn new skills.
Find out how to pick poisonous plants, trade more efficiently, get into the battle frenzy, regain health by helping others, and much more...

DISCOVER ALCHEMICAL ASPECTS

Every ingredient you'll find consists of alchemical aspects.
To find out about them you'll need some help from your pets.
Level them up and unravel the whole Great Alchemy Wheel!

data.name: The Remains of The Day
data.detailed_description:
3D space multiplayer party game. In every single game, crews need to move the spaceship to the final within 40 minutes. Imposters need to stop crews from doing that.


Press F to interact, long press F to mine/repair;
Click the left mouse button to use the selected item;
Left-click to use ice to add oxygen to the space suit;
Left click to use energy can add energy to the space suit;
When both of them are wearing spacesuits, they can connect. The connecting person only consumes the braking oxygen of one person, and the connected person moves with the connecting person without consuming braking oxygen;
Kinetic guns cause air leaks on spaceship and spacesuits, and repairs require consumable parts. Air leaks in space suits can only be repaired by others;
The imposter presses the middle of the mouse to open the seethrough vision, and the imposter can craft things directly by pressing E in the spacesuit state.


The game has designed an EMP gun, and the effect is still being planned. I hope players can give me more suggestions.

Alpha testing QQ Group: 321173720

data.name: Blacklight
data.detailed_description:
Fly, Run, Solidify and Break!
Light-paced 2D fighting game!

A simple fighting game with a dash that can stop immediately, a two-step jump, a dash in the air, and a variety of other moves that are easy to control.
A simple fighting game with a variety of moves and easy controls.
There is a risk of grinding and guard crashes when guarding, and the damage of techniques is large, so the tempo of each match is fast.
Easy to understand and quick to learn, you're ready to fight!

Great training mode and networking features!
Hitbox, frame data, and recording/playback functions allow you to check the situation in detail.
Lobby function and rollback are available for online matches.
You can comfortably play against players from far away!

Features

Six unique characters.
Lobby function and rollback for online matches.
Practice mode with hitboxes and frame data.
Replay function.

data.name: HexLands
data.detailed_description:
Discord


Try my previous game!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1346210/Regrowth/


About the Game



Your goal is to expand your empire to as many harder and harder procedural islands as possible to maximize your empire’s population!
You have to efficiently use the available resources, tools and perks, adapt to the environment, complete procedural quests... otherwise you can’t establish a strong enough colony to set sail for the next one!
Set sail, and choose wisely! Which island's perk and biome fits your playstyle and strategy the best?
Will you endure the harsh cold in the north, the arid desert islands, and other nasty climates?
How far will your empire reach?



  • Your first building is always a town hall, which claims some tiles around itself.
  • If you reach a specific population with a town (i.e. by building houses), its territory grows, claiming even more land! Try not to overlap towns!😉
  • If your island is populated enough, you can leave for the next one!
  • But why waste those valuable resources? Build as much as you can so your empire prospers!



  • Every turn, you have to build something on your island!
  • Every turn, you get a maximum of 3 random options to build from. They are selected from the pool of currently buildable buildings.
  • A building is buildable if you own a suitable tile and you have enough resources.
  • So if you want to increase your chances of getting a specific building… you must rule out the other possible buildings! Achieve it by spending a specific resource or building on a specific type of tile.





  • Though every island is a clean slate, you won’t set foot empty-handed!
  • Every island rewards you with a perk, helping you till the very end! So choose your next island wisely, build synergy!
  • Collect various tools, special cards and save them for later! Maybe planting a forest or discovering a mine is what’s going to save your colony!
  • Build structures like trading ports, which benefit your future islands as well!
  • A balanced toolkit is the key: a harmony of perks, tool cards filling the gaps and buildings on previous islands supporting your future endeavours!



Once you can’t expand any further, you meet with your empire’s population, your final score.
Can your colonies reach the top of the leaderboards?😉



  • If you want more challenge, try the time limit mode! (looking at you, speedrunners!)
  • If you want to chill, try the sandbox mode!

This game offers you:

  • High replay value - Explore endless procedural islands!
  • Roguelike elements
  • Chance management
  • City building on relaxing medieval islands with various biomes
  • Resource management
  • Perks, offering you customisable playstyle
  • Master the game and climb the leaderboard!

But doesn’t offer you:

  • Battles
  • Complex story
  • 4X Strategy
  • Multiplayer
  • Lootboxes
  • 40 man raids

Please keep in mind that I’m just a solo but passionate developer. This is not a AAA experience with hours and hours of content. I love Civilization, but HexLands is not really close to the 4X genre. What I’m creating is a simple at first sight but hard to master game. And you don’t even have to get a second mortgage to afford it!

Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have feedback, questions, or problems with the game. I’ll try my best! Oh, and let me know if you enjoyed the game, because that just makes my day!🙂

HexLands is inspired by such great games like:

  • Islanders
  • Dorf Romantik
  • Sid Meier’s Civilization
  • and many more! (like I was listening to an endless Age of Empires soundtrack during the first month of development)

data.name: Spicy Strip Poker
data.detailed_description:
ABOUT THE POKER GAME
The game is a 5 card poker game, played with a deck of 32 cards.
The player is dealt five cards, then begins a round of betting before replacing the cards.
In this variant, the player is allowed to replace all five cards.
After the replacement of cards follows another round of betting, and then the hands are revealed.
The best hand wins the pot or splits the pot in case of a tie.
During the betting round the player can bet/raise from 5 to 25, call, check, or fold.



Hand rank [high-low]
- Straight Flush
- Four of a Kind
- Flush
- Full House
- Straight
- Three of a Kind
- Two Pair
- Pair
- High Card

ABOUT THE STRIP GAME
The player can pick one of the available female opponents and try to beat her.
The girls involved will be:



- Amanda: a pink haired voluptuous goddess, ready to challenge you, but also to pay your spicy reward in case of defeat!



- Yanet: a stunning and mysterious ebony beauty



- Jessica: the blonde angel anyone dreams of



- Victoria: could you even imagine a spicier girl than a spicy redhead? :)

The player and the opponent start with a 200 stack each.
Whenever the opponent reaches zero, she strips off a garment, until she is completely naked.
At this point, the opponent remains completely naked and with a stack of 200.
The player must still win her last money to unlock sex scenes.
Obviously, if the player loses all the stack he loses the game, but no drama he can always start a new one. :)

data.name: Forest of Frequencies
data.detailed_description:
Step into a world where music, magic and nature collide.

Forest of Frequencies is a single player music adventure strategy game where you can explore a world filled with dangerous creatures, breath taking flora and spirits looking for their bodies. Music, visual art & gameplay comes together to form a unique experience made for those who love the interplay and combination of art forms.

Features

Tune into the power of magical frequencies
Effect the world around you with music. Search for magical frequencies using a radio to aid you on your journey. Hypnotise enemies, guide souls and defeat hungry hollow husks all through the power of music.

Protector of musical spirits
The forest is suffering. Musical spirits have become separated from their bodies and have had to go into hiding to avoid predation. Find these spirits and safely guide them back to their bodies.

Dangers of the Forest
On your journey you will encounter different enemies that all pose a unique danger. Some can be hypnotised by music, some are drawn to music and others will detune your radio. You must come up with a plan to keep you and the spirits safe.

Choose your own path
Find your own way through the environment. The clearest path might not be the safest one… or the most adventurous.

Breath-taking environment
The magic of music has not only affected the creatures within the world but the flora as well. Glowing mushrooms and coral like fungi dot the landscape. Lose yourself in this rich environment.

About the team
Forest of Frequencies was made within 14 weeks by Dapper Pigeon, a team of 16 students without prior game design or development experience. Everything in the game from models to the music has been produced by the team itself. The team would like to thank everybody who helped during the process of developing our game and of course you the players!

Can't wait? Whishlist now to be notified as soon as Forest of Frequencies is released!

Find your own way through the environment. The clearest path might not be the safest one… or the most adventurous.

Breath-taking environment
The magic of music has not only affected the creatures within the world but the flora as well. Glowing mushrooms and coral like fungi dot the landscape. Lose yourself in this rich environment.

About the team
Forest of Frequencies was made within 14 weeks by Dapper Pigeon, a team of 16 students without prior game design or development experience. Everything in the game from models to the music has been produced by the team itself. The team would like to thank everybody who helped during the process of developing our game and of course you the players!

Can't wait? Whishlist now to be notified as soon as Forest of Frequencies is released!
data.short_description: Forest of Frequencies is a single player music adventure-strategy game where you must guide spirits back to their bodies. Explore a world filled with dangerous creatures and breathtaking flora.

data.name: The Lamplighters League - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the complete soundtrack from The Lamplighters League and the Tower at the End of the World, featuring 24 original tracks by award-winning composer Jon Everist, recorded at historic Abbey Road Studio 1. The perfect companion for your 1930's capers, daring rescues, heists, and battles with supernatural villains. Jon Everist's soundtrack effortlessly moves from jazz-inspired noir to heart-pumping, larger-than-life-adventure as you recruit the best of the worst to come together to save the world.

To access The Lamplighters League original soundtrack files (MP3 and WAV) go to your Steam main folder; by default, the path is:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\music\LamplightersLeague\

data.name: Azazel's Christmas Fable Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: From the dark sinister caves of the underworld to the Christmassy streets of Santa's Village, this soundtrack features the musical backdrop that accompanies Azazel throughout his devilish shenanigans. Listen to The Sugar Plum Fairies from Club I.C.E. perform the most memorable songs like; Azazel's Christmas, the opening title theme; their dancy rendition of Jolly Old Saint Nicholas; the jazz-infused stylings of Jingle Bells; and most notably, their punk-driven take on Deck the Halls, featuring none other than Azazel himself on vocals, swapping lyrics filled with Christmas spirit for hellish stanzas riddled with horror. Can't stomach the traditional cheese of Christmas music every year? This collection of tunes will have you embracing the darker side of some holiday classics.

data.name: Stonga Bird
data.detailed_description:
Stonga Bird is a score attack game about an irradiated bird who has a hard time staying in the air. Time your little "hops" to dodge the industrial pipes to prevent death.

Your bird is very fragile and will explode upon contact with anything but the clear air. You have to avoid all obstacles and reach as high of a score as possible to brag to your friends.

This is a portrait-mode windowed game which was designed to be played with a mouse.

data.name: Abyss World : Apocalypse
data.detailed_description:
Players will explore the traces of the "Old Tide" in the vast land of Nordinia, and uncover the secrets behind it. In the past, the souls of the world arrived on the other side of the sea - "Old Tide". However, with the appearance of the "Fire Thief" event, the Old Tide disappeared, the balance of order was broken, and the souls were no longer attracted to the other side.
The strange tide sounds attracted the Black Tide, which devoured all. However, the darkness of that resting place was shed by the light... and the glory story will also begin.

-Explore the vast world
The game's main stage is set in "Nornidia", a world full of ancient secrets, where players can explore the vast open lands. In the game, players can travel to the farthest regions of Nornidia, step into the world eroded by the underworld, and gradually move towards the depths of the fog.

-Mysterious story plot
There lies threats hidden behind the underworld fog. By completing tasks to light up lighthouses around the world, players will face the many threats and evil left behind by the old world, and face the truth hidden by the world.

-Fight alongside and gather ancient souls from different realms and build relationships with them to learn their stories. Connect and restore this world through your actions, and build your city of souls.

-Dynamic world quest system
Unlike traditional questing systems, player actions and decisions will determine the outcomes of some areas of the world and the appearence of many levels. Players will create their own epic stories through their adventures.

data.name: Dawn of Shadow
data.detailed_description:
ABOUT DAWN OF SHADOW


Evil lurks the realm! An ancient force is awakening from it's ashes. Dawn of Shadow set in a Low-Fantasy Medieval World.
Choose your path and dive into a tale of epic fantasy in this action RPG title!

CREATE YOUR HERO
Become a keeper of the peace, join order of the Knight Templars. Choose from a wide selection of character customization elements, or play as a pre-built character. Explore, build, loot, battle through the realm and beyond.

AN ORIGINAL STORY
You find yourself in a cataclysmic turn of events. Templar Order, once Realm's mightiest heroes, now turn evil, seek to dominate free peoples and anyone who oppose them. Seeking ancient knowledge, they plan to awaken Legions of Hell back from the Abyss.

FAMILIAR YET UNIQUE
As fans of aRPG, Hack and Slash, and Souls-like games. We tried our best to mix best parts of those genres.

Magic Schools
Learn from different trainers or explore ancient knowledge to unlock hidden Magical abilities

Items, Loot and Enchantments
Hundreds of items and item enchantments that comes with a unique Rune system.

Tactical Combat
Tactical combat that offers wide range of weapons with unique playstyles, skills and combos!

Character Customization
Create your own Hero, and customize even more as game progresses!

Unique Boss Fights
Each boss feels different! Adapt, follow patterns and slay.

Wide range of Enemies and Monsters
Over hundred of different Mob types to battle from Wights to Humans, Orcs to Treants.

Quests & Player Driven Story
Follow the main storyline or create your own story.

A living world
From towns to castles, dungeons to ruins. Dawn of Shadow offers wide variety of places to visit and explore.

data.name: Nautikin Adventures
data.detailed_description:
Nautikins

The Nautikins have evolved from a species similar to dolphins to inherit the planet after untold eons. Masters of boat building they have set out to dominate the seas with exploration and shipping routes.

Features

  • Boat building
  • Buoyancy physics
  • Plane building
  • Helicopter building
  • Airfoils / Aero drag
  • Multiplayer
  • Vessel building system
  • Dynamic weather
  • Dynamic ocean simulation (waves)
  • Underwater simulation
  • Many islands to explore
  • Inventory system
  • Vessel damage system
  • Trade routes and shipping

Building

There is an elaborate vessel building interface that allows you to build sea or air vessels in an open world drydock or runway respectively.


Building vessels can be complicated, so check out some of the community guides

Exploration

A massive open world / ocean map filled with islands awaits you! Be warned though! If you go to far out to sea (currently ~50km), the sea monsters may think you are lunch.

Multiplayer

Multiplayer supports every feature that is supported in single player. You can build boats and deploy them and your friends will see them and be able to crew or captain them. Some functionality may be authorized only by the owner of the server depending on the effect.

Chat

The game includes a very basic low profile text based chat to allow for communication during multiplayer. It is intended primarily as a quick message relay and to aid players in connecting on Discord or Steam chat.

Weather

Physical weather systems (Rain, Storms, Fog, Wind, etc.) move around the map and can be monitored for your vessels safety on a journey. The further away from the protection of the islands the more intense the affect the weather will have on your vessel and the ocean waves around you. Be prepared for severe weather such as "tidal" force waves and whirlpools.

data.name: Fears of Glasses o-o World War
data.detailed_description:
The second part of the game, in which players will have to face new fears. You can buy the first part here
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1794740/Fears_of_Glasses__oo/
========================================================

In this game you have to overcome your fears in the war.
Explosions, shots, weapons.
Everything that you are afraid of, you will find in this game.

Using the keyboard and mouse, you have to control a character who wears a gas mask and find a way out of the battlefield by surviving.

Open, close your eyes on the E key.

Tips will appear in the left glass of glasses, at what point which key will need to be used.

The longer your eyes are open, the longer they will be closed.
If your eyes are closed for a long time, you will die of fear.
If your eyes are closed when the bomb falls you will die.

You will have to carefully consider each step, when to open your eyes, when to close them in order to survive.

data.name: Marshmallow Imouto Succubus
data.detailed_description:
More Orcsoft More Love

Get more from Orcsoft on Steam with Childhood Friends

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1549160/


About the Game

STORY


Tsukikawa Keisuke had a strange dream. That dream involved his innocent younger sister, Saki. Saki was a naïve girl who even believed that babies were made from just kissing. However in his dream, Saki’s innocence was replaced by eyes filled with lust as she creeps into Keisuke’s bed. The next day, Saki was her same innocent self to Keisuke’s relief. He was relieved that it was a merely a dream.

However, he soon learns from his father that a succubus lurks within his little sister. Having to choose between his dear, innocent little sister and the allure of a lustful succubus, what will Keisuke do?

FEATURES

  • Visual novel with 2 possible endings
  • Japanese voice acting (Except protagonist)
  • Voiced line playback
  • History/backlog function

data.name: Withersworn
data.detailed_description:
Withersworn is a unique action game combining speed and style to provide a free-flowing immersive experience. Adventure through a surreal dystopia where the powerful resource Resin has technologically advanced the kingdom at the cost of its humanity. With the kingdom slipping away you are one of the elite knights sworn to stop the withering.

Gameplay Freedom

Your Withersworn powers harness a grapple which has few restrictions where you are free to explore and approach any challenge. Ride your board in open areas to further increase your mobility and access the world how you choose.

Intuitive Design

Both actions and enemies are designed to respond intuitively. Every move will respond differently based on subtle state or inputs where you are in total control. Forget traditional bullet sponge enemies with health bars, enemies have visual feedback where every hit will impact the area and can change an enemies behaviour.

Awe and Wonder

The world and lore have been carefully crafted to provide a deeply immersive story. Adventure through dreamlike vistas and encounter a cast of memorable characters for an unforgettable experience.

Playstyle Variety

A variety of gear is available to play how you desire. Approach encounters to your liking and try various methods to achieve victory.

data.name: Seas Of Strife
data.detailed_description:
Join the Discord!


Remember to add to your wishlist!


About the Game



Seas of strife is an open world action adventure strategy game that takes place in a fantasy themed world beset by water. You as a player can carve out your own story in this ocean of cultural rivalries, warring kingdoms, bloodthirsty pirates, pious zealots and opportunistic traders.

Create and develop your characters skills to suit your playstyle as you plunder and trade your way to untold riches, shaping the world for better or for worse around you as you go. Raise a fleet then hire skilled crew and captains to wage large scale 3rd person fleet battles to determine the fate of entire kingdoms!

Explore new oceans never seen before! Meet exotic strange minor factions who are just as likely to eat you than greet you! Fight their enemies to gain newfound allies!

Or do absolutely none of that, and just go fishing! It's entirely up to you!






  • Play your way! Be a pirate, trader, privateer, adventurer or conqueror!
  • Pick from a pool of 18 unique ships to create your fleet!
  • Blast your enemies out of the water with 30 unique weapons!
  • Crew your ships and expand your raiding party with your pick from 60 different sailors and soldiers!
  • Join one of 6 major fantasy themed factions of humans, dwarves, orcs or elves... or create your own and destroy them all!
  • Discover and interact with 20+ strange and mysterious minor factions!
  • Trade exotic goods across the entire ocean! Shaping how wars play out through the power of commerce! (But watch out for pirates!)
  • Complete quests for that big payday!
  • Explore outside the known borders into the ever changing procedurally generated unknown seas!
  • Chase down the best fishing spot in the whole ocean!

data.name: Riley In The Abyss
data.detailed_description:
Riley In The Abyss is a stealth action single-player game inspired by games and movies such as Alien, Deadspace, and Underwater.

You take the role of Riley, an Underwater engineering tech. She is positioned on the 4th level/ floor of an underwater research tower facility. Assisting scientists and researchers here, to embark on the unknown of the ocean's mysterious unexplored depths.
The entirety of the crew working in this section keeps reporting strange sounds beneath them. Bewildered and enthralled, crew members begin to contact teams in the lower sections of the research facility. Unbeknownst to any of the current events, Riley is asleep in her pod.

As she wakes up, head pounding, to her surprise everyone is...

Players will embark on a linear/free-roam story. They sneak and fight their way toward the elevator to exit this underwater facility.


Key Features:
Riley In The Abyss provides deep storytelling, Environmental storytelling. Third-person shooting and stealth elements.


All UI is visible on the protagonist, Riley speaks to provide hints, story development, ammo count, notes, etc. For a more immersive experience.

data.name: Little Eternal Chronicle
data.detailed_description:
──This is Azurheim. A world that will soon be destroyed.──

The "Chronium," the heart of the world, will be destroyed and pieces will rain down all over the world.
Only children under 10 years old can survive for six months until the end of the world.

Strategic battles in which players use clocks to manipulate time.
A beautiful world spun on a hand-drawn map.

As the world is heading for collapse....
The world is on the verge of collapse... "Polluted Beasts" of Chronium, mysterious "Bad Ghosts" that eat people, and.... humans.
A story of seven people and one cat who face various threats.

Strategic battles in which players manipulate time using "clocks".

Child characters (and the cat) have "clock" during battles and you can set skills at 0, 3, 6, and 9 o'clock on the clock.
Collect new "clock skills" and manipulate the hands of the clock to gain an advantage in battle.

And exhilarating combat with skill after skill by adult characters!
Combine the strengths of children and adults to create the best synergy.

Naughty, naughty, naughty!

Children are mischievous... even if the world is falling apart!
Scribbles on adult's backs!!
Scare them with firecracker and make them jump up!!

A serious story filled with tension can be ruined by you...!
A new side story can be born from a prank...?!

Other

-All maps and characters are hand-drawn, and the world is decorated with warm graphics.
The sound is also original.
-The storyline is rich with time leaps, and the main character tries to change his destiny.
What is different from other works, however, is that when you go back to the past, your memories are definitely not retained.
-The collapse of the world does not happen in an instant, but gradually devastates.
The field screen shows erosion, and the earth is gradually becoming dirtier and dirtier.
The icons that show where you can move around change from orange to red.

The cooking system is a very simple and easy to use system.
The main character, "Is" is an energetic girl who is an excellent cook.
She will show her skills in her travels.

This game is an RPG with active time battle.
It's fast-paced, strategic, the characters are cute, and the bananas are delicious! 🍌
Character development is the usual level up.
You can further develop your character and collect skills through exploration and side stories.
Explore contaminated areas and you may find something more valuable.

data.detailed_description:
YOU MAY ALSO LIKE

About the Game

Paint by Pixel is a relaxing puzzle game where you create beautiful works of art one pixel at a time. Choose between brush or fill mode, recolor your drawings to personalize them, and use zoom and the magnifying glass to focus on details.



The game also includes an autofill feature and hints to make things easier. With 95 levels to choose from, Paint by Pixel is the perfect game to unwind and explore your artistic side.



  • Choose from 95 beautiful works of art!
  • Pick and play any level!
  • Customizable colors!
  • Beautiful soundtrack!
  • Zoom and magnify for easy play!
